detectors.description:
FiftyFlip.sendFunds(address,uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#323-331) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- success = paidUser.send(amount) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#324)

detectors.description: FiftyFlip.play(uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#162-207) uses a weak PRNG: "jackpotRes = random % JACKPOT_MODULO (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#175)"

FiftyFlip.play(uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#162-207) uses a weak PRNG: "maskRes = (random % 2) != 0 (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xe09b1ab8111c2729a76f16de96bc86a7af837928.sol#174)"
